Dehydration due diarrhea pose risk health renal transplant recipient . Therefore Dukoral may benefit group traveler . AIM OF THIS STUDY : Primary objective : To verify whether vaccination Dukoral® ( SBL Vaccines ) induce immune response renal transplant recipient prednisolone combination either calcineurin inhibitor ( cyclosporine tacrolimus ) mycophenolate mofetil . Secondary objective : To evaluate extent , immune response differs , depend use different class immunosuppressive drug ( CNI MMF ) . STUDY DESIGN : Single center interventional study . Population : The population base study consist adult renal transplant recipient receive transplant medical center . The control population consist healthy partner sibling renal transplant recipient . We intend include 10 healthy volunteer 60 renal transplant recipient ( 20 prednisolone CNI 20 prednisolone MMF ) . Intervention : Dukoral® ( SBL Vaccines ) administer orally baseline ( day 0 ) day 14 . Laboratory analysis : Serum CTB antibody ( ELISA ) , Vibriocidal assay . The analysis perform Crucell . Statistical analysis : No formal sample-size calculation perform .
